name: PAWNY
description:
A new way of playing chess in a video game mixed with puzzles. In Pawny you can travel through different chess worlds with different mechanics and puzzles for each world.

GAME DESCRIPTION

You are the last piece of the black team and you will have to defeat the kings of the different worlds to become the true king of the board. All linked to a different way of playing chess, traveling through various worlds with different mechanics each one, with various puzzles that will make this experience unique.

Use your wits and knowledge of chess to overcome unique puzzles never before encountered in the classic board game.

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Q & E to rotate the camera

L-Shift + W / S to move the box
